html: And. Notwithstanding the sins of his people, God will deliver them, that they may be his witnesses, ver. 10. (Calmet) — Name. As an intimate friend, (Haydock) or slave, chap. xlix. 1. (Calmet) — God grants grace without any preceding merit. (Worthington) — Forerius explains this mostly of the Gentile church, though it regards the converted Jews. (Houbigant)
